overview:
Jason is a co-founder of Leaky (leaky.com) and an MBA Candidate at MIT Sloan with a diverse background in finance and entrepreneurship.

Prior to Sloan, Jason worked as a private equity analyst at AIF Capital in Hong Kong, where he was involved in making investments across Asia as well as over US$1 billion in fundraising. While in Hong Kong, Jason also founded CopyCat Paintings, a successful Shenzhen-based company that specializes in custom-made, hand-painted oil paintings. Jason is also a Chartered Financial Analyst that graduated with honors from Texas A&M University with a BBA in Finance.

He also competed in a 155-mile ultramarathon through the Sahara Desert for charity.
